data.title: Distance from Yorkton to ...
data.meta_description: Shows the distance from Yorkton to the North Pole, Equator, South Pole and any place in the world. Includes air line, route, centre, route planner, flight route and interactive map.
data.text:
North pole: 2,679.67 mi (4,312.52 km)

How far is Yorkton from the North Pole? Yorkton is located 2,679.67 mi (4,312.52 km) south of the North Pole.

Equator: 3,538.73 mi (5,695.04 km)

How far is Yorkton from the equator and on what hemisphere is it? Yorkton is 3,538.73 mi (5,695.04 km) north of the equator, so it is located in the northern hemisphere.

South pole: 9,756.99 mi (15,702.36 km)

How far is it from Yorkton to the South Pole? From Yorkton to the South Pole, it is 9,756.99 mi (15,702.36 km) in the north.

Antipode: -51.216667,77.533333

Where do I get to when I dig a hole in Yorkton through the centre of the earth? This is the point on the Earth's surface when you draw a straight line from Yorkton through the centre of the earth.

Furthest cities from Yorkton

Which city (at least 500,000 inhabitants) is furthest away and what is the distance from Yorkton?
